title: Thank you for Star Guardian MF
body:
I don't see these kinds of threads often, but I just want to thank Rito for the new MF skin.
I'm really enjoying it {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

replies.body:
Worth it alone for the panty shot.

Definitely her best skin now.

Although, on the other hand, I'm a little sad because now that she has like over nine-thousand skins, she's probably never going to see an 1820 or 3250.
Let's be real. She will. She's like Ahri or Yi where she will constantly get new skins. Thank God. No complaints here as a MF main.

> [{quoted}](name=Placentas,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=A4iGxTzq,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-09-16T23:11:26.192+0000)
>
> Let's be real. She will. She's like Ahri or Yi where she will constantly get new skins. Thank God. No complaints here as a MF main.

I see you are a man of culture.

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
I will say she has one of the best new Star Guardian stickers on the boards. {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}   {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}} {{sticker:sg-ezreal}} {{sticker:sg-soraka}} {{sticker:sg-syndra}}
How do you get her icon? Just by buying the 5 skins bundle? (I din't lime syndra's)

> [{quoted}](name=Elipo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=A4iGxTzq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-16T18:59:16.690+0000)
>
> How do you get her icon? Just by buying the 5 skins bundle? (I din't lime syndra's)

You don't have to get the group bundle, you can buy their individual bundles for 1775 rp. "First Star Edition" It comes with the skin, champ, loading border and icon.
She has the best channel of the guardians in the mode. -lenny face place holder-
its nice but people arent on it because the believe Miss Fortune or Syndra should have gotten the legendary skin Arhi got.
